reply: Admission is done mainly through online application via the official college website. Selection is based on merit, eligibility criteria, and reservation norms. Shortlisted candidates are called for counseling/admission confirmation.
College timings are generally 8:30 AM to 1:30 PM for most UG and PG programmes. Some courses may have extended hours for labs or activities.
Fees vary by course. Please visit the college office for specific details regarding your chosen programme.
The college has 30+ academic departments across Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Computer Science, Languages, Social Work, Physical Education, and Research.
PSGRKCW offers 80+ courses, including UG, PG, Diploma, Certificate, M.Phil., and Ph.D. programmes.
Yes. Students are expected to wear decent and modest attire. Traditional and formal dressing is encouraged. There is no specific uniform for regular days.
Courses include Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Computer Applications, Social Work, Biotechnology, Data Science, Cyber Security, and more at UG and PG levels.
Hostel facilities include secure accommodation, dining hall, study area, Wi-Fi, medical care, laundry, and 24/7 security.
Yes. The college has a canteen/cafeteria providing hygienic, affordable vegetarian food.
The college has well-equipped laboratories with modern instruments for science, computer science, and research programmes.
Yes. A gymnasium is available for students, along with indoor and outdoor sports facilities.
Yes. Students can avail government scholarships, merit scholarships, minority scholarships, and financial aid schemes.
The college offers athletics, basketball, volleyball, badminton, yoga, kho-kho, and indoor games, with regular competitions.
Clubs include NSS, NCC, Rotaract, Literary Club, Music, Dance, Drama, Environment Club, Entrepreneurship Cell, etc.
Yes. A campus map is available on the official website and at the college office.
The Career Guidance and Placement Cell trains students and conducts campus interviews. Many reputed companies recruit from PSGRKCW.
Yes. The college provides bus transportation covering major areas of Coimbatore.
Yes. The college regularly conducts cultural festivals, department fests, celebrations, and competitions.
The college has a well-maintained campus with modern classrooms, labs, auditorium, library, and green spaces.
The library has thousands of books, journals, e-resources, digital databases, and e-learning access.
PSGRKCW is consistently ranked among the top colleges in India in the NIRF College category.
Yes. The college offers Diploma and Certificate courses in areas like computer applications, data analytics, fashion, and skill-based programmes.
UG: Pass in 10+2 from a recognized board. PG: Relevant undergraduate degree. Specific courses may have subject-based requirements.
Students must follow discipline, attendance norms, dress code, exam rules, and code of conduct set by the institution.
Achievements include high NIRF rankings, research excellence, university ranks, placements, and national awards.
Yes. Students can withdraw following official procedures, submission of documents, and fee regulations.
Students can apply online through the official website. Some programmes may also allow offline applications.
Yes. Students may apply for multiple programmes, but must submit separate applications.
Quotas include SC/ST, OBC, minority, sports, differently-abled, and management quota (as per norms).
The Principal of PSGR Krishnammal College for Women is Dr. P. B. Harathi.
You can contact college officials through the official website, phone numbers, email, or by visiting the college campus.
The college has academic deans, programme directors, and heads of departments overseeing various faculties.
Courses include Computer Science, Information Technology, BCA, Data Science, Cyber Security, AI & Analytics.
Yes. The GRG hostel is highly secure, with wardens, CCTV surveillance, and restricted entry.
Hostel fees generally range from ₹60,000 to ₹70,000 per year, depending on room type and facilities.
Hostel admission is given based on distance, availability, and priority criteria, after college admission.
Yes. Wi-Fi connectivity is available for students within the campus.
Mobile phones are allowed with restrictions and should not be used during class hours.
PSGR Krishnammal College for Women has more than 30 academic departments.
